title: 02: Betting against Apple Pay, with Daniel Bader
description:
Gartenberg, Caldwell, and Ritchie are joined by Daniel Bader to discuss the challenges Apple Pay faces when it comes to global expansion and consumer adoption.

Show notes

  • Apple Pay expands to Big Five banks in Canada with support for Visa, MasterCard and Interac
  • Canadian banks, including 'the Big Five,' sign on for major Apple Pay expansion
  • Apple Pay-led surge in ANZ card customers drives rival banks to renegotiate
  • Cabinet approves Apple Pay's introduction in Taiwan
  • Kohl's Charge and Yes2You Rewards Now Easy as One Tap in Apple Pay
  • Apple Pay on the web/in browsers in iOS 10/OS X 10.12

Guests

  • Daniel Bader

Hosts

  • Michael Gartenberg
  • Serenity Caldwell
  • Rene Ritchie

Feedback
